EmailTemplate.subject: Sears Commercial Monthly Realtor Specials
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Sears Commercial Monthly Realtor Specials
Great prices this month on a 4.0 CF front load washer Only $440 Also matching 7.3 CF dryer Kenmore $440
For your Kitchen In Black or white
Self cleaning Smooth top range $442 Energy star qualified dishwasher $209 Micro Hood combination $126
Please click on the link below to view the flyer for specific items, or call Kelly Payne (615)731-9572 Or Alan Ball, (615)364-7163, for details or pricing
https://na1.salesforce.com/sfc/p/30000000lp1bhjkOSiPWxKZlR0LP1RXZfEm4.48=
Remember we have all the major brands in appliances, as well as other items for the Home, like, Mattresses, exercise equipment, tractors, mowers, TV’s, game tables, and more. Always lower than retail sale prices.
5% off sears Gift cards Sears Gift cards can be used at Sears, Outlet stores, LandsEnd, and Kmart stores.
